DOC.brief_summary: X-ray compute tomography imaging ( CT ) routinely use follow-up endovascular aneurysm repair ( EVAR ) . Contrast-enhanced ultrasound ( CEUS ) show give accurate information endoleak EVAR . This study design investigate result literature reproducible St Olavs Hospital Trondheim ( Norway ) , gain experience technique introduce CEUS alternative detection endoleak hospital .
